name: linter-coffees6

2.0.0.name: linter-coffees6
2.0.0.description: Lint CoffeeScript on the fly, using coffee (with ES6 import/export syntax)

readme:
# linter-coffees6

This linter plugin for [Linter](https://github.com/AtomLinter/Linter) provides an interface to [CoffeeScript](http://coffeescript.org/) with the ES6 hacks provided [here](https://github.com/alexspeller/ember-cli-coffees6). This plugin provides only syntax checking.

metadata.name: linter-coffees6
metadata.description: Lint CoffeeScript on the fly, using coffee (with ES6 import/export syntax)
